critique: This document amends a previous executive order regarding the President's Commission on Strategic Forces. It adjusts the reporting deadline and termination date of the commission. Given the subject matter relates to strategic forces, it has implications for national security. However, the changes themselves are administrative in nature. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration stance, expansion of executive power, federalism implications, economic regulation, or social inclusion. The primary focus appears to be on the efficient operation and reporting timeline of the commission.
